titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ä€bu] to Percy William Powlett

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's intention to study all the states and Chiefs under his responsibility and the rumours that this has sparked.The letter goes on to discuss matters with the Maharajah of Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] and the Ulwa [Alwar] chief and requesting information on the protocol for visits between the agent and the chief and the time intervals between them.
